TopicTitle: Is .22 going to include performance updates?

Articles.Content: You know, so i can build the megastations I have always wanted to ever since docking came out?

Definitely maybe.

But seriously.. probably not to the point of supporting mega stations, that will rely on hardware I suspect

Every version is going to contain some kind of optimization or performance upgrades in one way or another-- However, I don't think the level of change you're looking for is going to happen in a single update.

Details of each patch are lined out in the patch notes, as well as weekly publications prior to release to get a sneak peak of what might be happening. Beyond that, anything you hear is speculation. Nobody has a secret list of things that are going to happen, as the QA process can and will change what you will see when the update is released, and such a list cannot be created or relied on if it were.

Be patient. We're still in early development and performance is being worked on with each update.

That said, I'll close this as to keep any false information or rumors from spreading about.
